requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:

  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
